H0.text: In which sci fi classic did the space ship Nostromo first appear. Star Wars

H1.text: In which sci fi classic did the space ship Nostromo first appear. Star Trek

H2.text: In which sci fi classic did the space ship Nostromo first appear. 2001: A Space Odyssey

H3.text: In which sci fi classic did the space ship Nostromo first appear. Alien

A4.text: The company that owns the Nostromo is not named in the film

A5.text: The Nostromo was originally yellow, and the team filmed shots of the models for six weeks before Johnson left to work on The Empire Strikes Back.
